function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on infectious disease prevention measures","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation and transmission among staff and patients","Mitigation":"Include specific training on infectious disease prevention and control measures in the course","Technologies":"Online training modules on infectious disease prevention","People":"Clinical staff, frontliners, mental health workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, training institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate focus on infection control in the built environment","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission within healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Integrate training on infection control measures within the built environment in the course","Technologies":"Simulation exercises for infection control, use of antimicrobial surfaces, air quality monitoring systems","People":"Healthcare facility managers, environmental services staff","Owner":"Healthcare facility management, infection control departments"},{"Description":"Lack of assessment of psychological impact of contagious disease outbreaks","Impact":"Increased anxiety and stress among staff and general public, leading to decreased mental well-being","Mitigation":"Incorporate psychological support and stress management techniques in the training course","Technologies":"Telemedicine for mental health support, online counseling services","People":"Clinical staff, mental health workers, general public","Owner":"Mental health professionals, healthcare organizations, government health agencies"}]}
